title: Pokemon Announcements Coming This Week - Kinda Funny Games Daily 02.24.22
description:
Tim and Lucy James breakdown the Pokemon Presents announcement, The Fallout New Vegas 2 Rumors, Knockout City going free-to-play, and more!   

Follow Lucy at https://twitter.com/lucyjamesgames

Time Stamps - 
00:00:00 - Start
00:02:48 - Housekeeping

Our Elden Ring review is up right now as a Kinda Funny Gamescast. Youtube.com/kindafunnygames and podcast services around the globe.

Tam’s beautiful review is up on GameSpot.com


Bless and Andy First Hour of Elden Ring Live 

Thank you to our Patreon Producers: Gordon McGuire, James Davis (@JamesDavisMakes), Pranksy, Manny The Bagel boy Sanchez, & Black Jack

The Roper Report -
00:05:22 - GSC Game World (S.T.A.L.K.E.R. Developer) Speaks Out On Status of Ukraine 
00:07:30 - New Pokémon Presents livestream coming Feb. 27, on Pokémon Day (Michael Whertor at Polygon)
00:16:05 - Nintendo Buys Game Developer It's Worked With For Almost 40 Years (Eddie Makuch at GameSpot)
00:20:37 - Fallout New Vegas 2 is reportedly in ‘very early talks at Microsoft’ (Jordan Middler at Video Games Chronicle)
00:29:50 - Ad  
00:31:56 - Knockout City Going Free-To-Play, EA No Longer Involved (Eddie Makuch at GameSpot.com)
00:38:04 - Martha Is Dead Reviews Are In
00:42:33 - Digital Foundry’s Elden Ring Performance Results Are In! (Digital Foundry, by way of Nibel)
00:45:06 - PlayStation Game Captures FINALLY Coming To PS App (Playstation Blog)
00:48:50 - Out today
 Reader mail -
00:49:59 - will Dying Light, Forbidden West, and now Elden Ring, start to cannibalize each other in sales moving forward? - Conor
00:53:00 - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s Hosts:Blessing & Parris

Tim and Lucy James breakdown the Pokemon Presents announcement, The Fallout New Vegas 2 Rumors, Knockout City going free-to-play, and more!


Follow Lucy at https://twitter.com/lucyjamesgames


Time Stamps -

00:00:00 - Start

00:02:48 - Housekeeping

  • Our Elden Ring review is up right now as a Kinda Funny Gamescast. Youtube.com/kindafunnygames and podcast services around the globe.
  • Tam’s beautiful review is up on GameSpot.com
  • Bless and Andy First Hour of Elden Ring Live 
  • Thank you to our Patreon Producers: Gordon McGuire, James Davis (@JamesDavisMakes), Pranksy, Manny The Bagel boy Sanchez, & Black Jack
